data.title: Scratch and Sniff labels
data.meta_description: Scented labels treated with a special coating imbued with microcapsules containing a chosen essence.Using scent to win over the customer.
data.text:
Using scent to win over the customer

Scented adhesive labels add an extra touch to the normal printed label. Their lingering scent will stay with the customer, and make your product more memorable.

Supplied on reels, these labels are treated with a special coating imbued with microcapsules containing your chosen perfumed essence.

When rubbed, these microcapsules break, releasing the scent.
